Title: Manipur High Court Recruitment 2024
Summary:
- Manipur High Court Recruitment 2024: The High Court of Manipur is inviting applications from eligible candidates for the posts of 8 Technical Assistant, 4 Legal Researcher, Verifiers (Meetei Mayek), and Verifiers (Roman)
- The vacancies for the mentioned posts will be filled on a Daily Wage & Work from Home Basis
- Eligible and interested candidates can apply online mode
